title: Levels 100-110: Eternal magic bows and primal crossbows
content: Note that the described methods end with the Mk. 5 version of the bow, rather than the 'martial' version, which would result in the bow being sacrificed for further experience, but would also result in the item being fully destroyed.

title: Level 81+ Rune and Dragon Darts (fastest)
content: Darts are made twice as fast as bolts and arrows, making them a very fast method.

title: Level 82+ Zygomite Carestyling
content: After completing the Extinction quest, players with at least level 82 Fletching can participate in the Zygomite Carestyling activity as part of 'Accidental' Fletching and Firemaking . There, players can style scruffy zygomites ' cuticles for around 200,000 Fletching experience per hour. Carestyling zygomites is fairly laid-back and can generate a profit from the tempered fungal shafts gathered and occasional unchecked zygomites found while taking part in the activity.
The use of a crystal knife is recommended as it provides a 5% chance of double shafts and experience, and does not degrade when carestyling.

title: Level 83+ Making Sagaies
content: Another alternative is making Sagaie at the Jadinko lair at level 83 Fletching, although this also requires 83 Woodcutting and 83 Firemaking, and it can be a lot slower than making Dragon darts or arrows due to the time spent collecting supplies. However, it is completely free.

title: Level 96+ Bundling bamboo
content: Bundling bamboo gives 100 experience per bundle, can be done with 2 golden bamboo or 5 bamboo obtained from the Arc region.
